text:
Merged mutliple threads into one testplan and ran a test using schedule time option.

When tried to stop the test before the end time in schedule option, got error as
"One or more thread groups wont exist."

But the thread groups are working fine, configuration is also set fine.
creator: nvn0047@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
I cannot trace that message anywhere in JMeter.

What is the *exact* error message shown in the log file?

Are you using any 3rd party add-ons?

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
I think message is this one:
"One or more test threads won't exit; see log file."

-->Sebb , Iam not using any third party add-ons.


-->Yes Philippe, thats the exact message displayed...
creator: nvn0047@gmail.com

text:
Hello,
Can you give more details ?
If possible attach a simplified Test plan.
Describe when you get this message .
Do all threads exit ?
Can you do a Thread Dump ? call kill -3 <pid> 3 times every 5s and attach log file.

Thank you
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
I close issue as no more details were provided.
Please feel free to reopen with required infos.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
